entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for metadata-only endpoints to support path-based authorization, output caching, etc. #43642
    .NET 8 Planning
  • dotnet watch tests fail when run locally #43640
  • Source-build behavior control update #43637
  • Log instead of just crashing when `PostLogoutRedirectUris` in client definition is empty #43634
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: single_query #43633
  • Add equivalent of HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId available at all times when hosted in IIS #43632

Closed

  • SignalR doesn't always reliable detect TCP/IP issues #43392
    7.0-rc2
  • React template should use UTF-8 #43636
  • Add equivalent of HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId available at all times when hosted in IIS #43631
  • Using different Authentication Scheme for JWT tokens does not work #43467
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Set `MSBUILDLOGALLENVIRONMENTVARIABLES` in most CI jobs #43644
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Require preview features for most quic options #43639
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] QUIC: Don't complete writes on abort #43630
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43638
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • Pin language version in release branch #43629
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43596
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Improve port search retry logic #43557
    area-runtime
  • Use normal `$(_BuildArgs)` in internal jobs w/ binlogs #43597
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix endpoints in StaticFileAuth sample #43352
    area-security, 8.0-alpha1
  • [Backport] [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43576
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.10
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1976557 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Update UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md #43627
    area-infrastructure
